pkgmetadata.longdescription: Instrumental Variables // Contains tools for instrumental variables estimation. Currently, non-parametric bounds, two- stage estimation and G-estimation are implemented. Balke, A. and Pearl, J. (1997) doi:10.2307/2965583, Vansteelandt S., Bowden J., Babanezhad M., Goetghebeur E. (2011) doi:10.1214/11-STS360.
